players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found she is the mafia. Bob was a villager, so Alice must have killed him. Vote Alice to stop the mafia."
Charlie: "Alice, you killed Bob. Vote Alice."
You: "I didn't kill Bob. Charlie, why do you say I killed him? You have no evidence."
Diana: "Alice is the mafia, she killed Bob. Charlie, you have no evidence. Vote Alice to stop the mafia."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Diana, thanks for the investigation. Alice, you killed Bob. Vote Alice to stop the mafia."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice and found she is the mafia. Bob was a villager, so Alice must have killed him. Vote Alice to stop the mafia."
Charlie: "Alice, you killed Bob. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I didn't kill Bob. Charlie, why do you say I killed him? You have no evidence."
You: "Alice is the mafia, she killed Bob. Charlie, you have no evidence. Vote Alice to stop the mafia."
Alice: remained silent.
Charlie: "Diana, thanks for the investigation. Alice, you killed Bob. Vote Alice to stop the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
